name: graffiti_tags
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jet_set_radio_api.
Tool description: A data provider for all things Jet Set Radio in JSON format!
API description: Fetches and returns a list of graffiti tags based on provided sorting and limiting parameters from the Jet Set Radio API.

orderby.description: Determines the order of the returned tags. Possible values are 'asc' for ascending and 'desc' for descending. Default is 'asc'.

limit.description: Limits the number of items returned in the response. Default is '5'.

sortby.description: Specifies the field by which the tags will be sorted. Examples include 'name' and 'stats'. Default is 'name'.
